name: Clock Collector
description:
Clock Collector was created for "Mini Jame Gam #6".

The theme was "Out of Time"

The special object was "Key" (not implemented, ran out of time)

Background: An evil monster that's always late to his monstrous obligations has gotten fed up and STOLEN all clocks from the town's local clock store! He's scattered them throughout the land, so we need to find all 15 to help the clock store out! Can you find them all?

There are 5 levels, each of which have 3 clocks which must be collected before moving to the next level. When you beat level 5, you have won!

Controls:
A & D for left and right
Spacebar for jump
